TopicTitle: Looking for a mod that can spawn a Kerbal or a group of Kerbals

Articles.Content:
What I want to do is have a rocket that has 6 Kerbals in it. This is to fill up my Space Station that's orbiting Duna, and I don't feel like launching multiple rockets with 3 Kerbals each.

Is there a mod lurking around, that I can spawn a Kerbal at the Launchpad? It'll make my life so much easier.

Crew manifest, on spaceport

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/18-1-kerbal-crew-manifest/

Simply send a hitch hiker can with your ship, and while your on the launch pad press the full ship button in crew manifest and it should fill every seat. (Not literally seats tho, it can't crew up the external seats)

Alternatively there's Hooligan Labs' Party Starter, which quite simply fills up all spots a Kerbal will fit (excepting exterior seats) at a single button click. But yes, Crew Manifest is good.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/hooligan-labs-party-starter-max-kerbals-before-launch/
